sentence.Network_en: The Pontiff celebrated mass in Mexico City.
sentence.Network_cn: 教皇在墨西哥城主持了弥撒。

sentence.Network_en: It will mark his first visit to the US as pontiff.
sentence.Network_cn: 这将是他任职教皇以来首次访问美国.

sentence.Network_en: The 82 - year - old pontiff made the comments in his weekly appearance in St.
sentence.Network_cn: 这位82高龄的教皇是在出席每周一次的圣彼得广场见面会时说这番话的.

list.abs: the pontiff also delivered comments in Spanish , recognizing a growing Catholic population in the Unites States . more than 550 priests were on hand , who distribute communion to the participants .教皇用西班牙语承认美国的天主教人口在增加。有550多个祭司当时在那里给神父在分发圣餐。
The vestments and insignia of a pontiff or a bishop., 主教的祭服 , 主教的徽章教皇或主教的法衣或徽章.
his 81st birthday is Wednesday and Saturday will mark the third anniversary of his election as pontiff .他的81岁生日是星期三，星期六将是他当选为教皇的三周年纪念日。
But the pontiff says that promise was not fulfilled for all in America ., 但是教皇说 , 并不是所有美国人都实现了自己的愿望.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 17th cent.: from French pontife, from Latin pontifex (see pontifex)
